Q1 → 123(10) = 1111011(2)
Q2 → 594(10) = 252(16)
Q3 → 21489(10)
Q4 → 1416220248455224146902(10) = 4CC6010C837916BBD6(16)

Q1. Layered mixed-base BEDMAS:
    ((1F3A)16 + (1011011101)2) * (347)8 - (11100111)2 ** (101)2 + (255)10 = (?)10
Q2.
    ((7ABC)16 - (345.6)8) * (1101.101)2 + (12345)10 / (3)10 = (?)16

Q3.
    Let A = (ABCDE)16 - (765432)8 + (111111111111)2
    Compute: (A ** (101)2) + (FACE)16 * (777)8  mod (1000003)10 = (?)10


Q1. Convert (7B)16 to decimal and binary
Q2. Convert (1101101)2 and (745)8 to decimal, then compute their sum and give the result in hexadecimal
Q3.
     ((1A3)16 + (101011)2) * (57)8 - (1111)2 ** (10)2 = (?)10
Q4.
     ((ABCDEF)16 - (76543)8 + (101001011011)2) ** (11)2
     + (12345)10 * (FACE)16 - (7777777)8 = (?)16
Q5.
     Convert (98765.4321)10 to binary, octal, and hexadecimal (show fractional conversion steps)
